response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This represents a significant savings compared to the market value of $15,000, making it an attractive deal for you. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope we can facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties.", "product_price": 14500}
